verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I lift my hands To the Coming King To the great I Am To You I sing For You’re the one Who reigns within my heart. (Sisters echo) (Repeat verse){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}(For) I will serve no foreign god Nor any other treasure For You are my heart’s desire The spirit without measure Unto Your name I will bring my sacrifice{/lang-eng}
